EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-Finance.Email 12_Getting to the heart of EC podcast
EmailTemplate.subject: Understanding the enterprise cloud and how it’s changing the game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Understanding OpenStack and the enterprise cloud Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Exploring new technologies and strategies can be daunting – or it can be invigorating. The question is, where to begin?
Let me suggest, “Getting to the Heart of the Enterprise Cloud <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2447.getting.to.heart.of.enterprise.cloud.V2.html?did=d000000000ap&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 12b-gettingtotheheartECpodcast&utm_term=finance]]>,” presented by industry expert Tom Nolle.
In the webinar, Tom shares insights about why enterprises need to move to an OpenStack enterprise cloud, and how it’s changing the game. This is a must-see webinar.
I hope that you enjoy this webinar! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
